subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello,
We received your email, and we want you to continue with your application,simply download the loan application form attached to this mail, enteryour personal and loan data and save the document. Send back thecompleted application form asap to begin the process of the loan. The loanyou seek will be offered to you at 2% interest rate.
We are a registered Private Loan Investment Company in the UnitedKingdom, we also registered with the Turkish British Chamber ofCommerce and Industry (TBCCI) we have operations in America, Europe and Asia.
We like to grant loan in the following sectors: Personal Loan, CarLoan, Oil/Gas, Banking, Real Estate, Stock Speculation and Mining,Transportation, Health Sector and Tobacco, Communication Services,Agriculture, Forestry & Fishing, thus any sector. The terms are veryflexible and interesting.
Be informed that if you do not have a property collateral within theUK, you should leave the space blank on the application form. If youhave any queries, do not hesitate to send us a mail.
I wait to hear from you in your next mail. Please if you have anyquestions to ask to make sure you do. I am in the best position to answeryour question.
Official Website:Â www.globalcapitalfunding.org

Company Address: Cheshire House, Gorsey Lane, Widnes,Cheshire, England, WA8 0RP
Thank you!
Sincerely,
Stephen Harry LiManaging DirectorGlobal Capital Funding

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Stephen Harry Capital Funding,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information you've provided about the loan process. It's great to hear that your company is registered with the Turkish British Chamber and Industry TBCCI and operates in various regions.

I do have a few questions before proceeding further. Could you please clarify what the interest rate would be for this loan? Also, could you provide more details about the terms of repayment?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Terry

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Thank you for your immediate response, we offer loans from $10,000 to $20,000,000 at 2% interest rate and maximum of 10 years for repayment, to proceed please kindly fill the loan application form accordingly and truthfully and return the filled copy to me so that we can proceed and start with the processing of your loan, I have once again attached the loan application form for you to fill and return back to me.
Official Website: www.globalcapitalfunding.org
Company Address: Cheshire House, Gorsey Lane, Widnes,Cheshire, England, WA8 0RP
Thank you!
Sincerely,
Stephen Harry LiManaging DirectorGlobal Capital Funding

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Stephen Harry Capital Funding,

Thank you for your prompt reply. I'm quite interested in the loan offer you've presented. However, before proceeding further, could you please provide me with more details? 

For instance, what is the exact interest rate for the loan? Also, are there any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of? And what would be the monthly repayment amount for a loan taken over a period of years?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Terry

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Thank you for your immediate response, like I said in my previous email the exact interest rate is 2% and please before we proceed you have to fill the loan application form, follow the due procedure please, if you come to our office first thing you will do is to fill the loan application form as long as you came for a loan unless you are not interested in getting a loan from us but please go ahead and fill the loan application form and send it back to me so we can get started.
Official Website: www.globalcapitalfunding.org
Company Address: Cheshire House, Gorsey Lane, Widnes,Cheshire, England, WA8 0RP
Thank you!
Sincerely,
Stephen Harry LiManaging DirectorGlobal Capital Funding.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Stephen Harry Capital Funding,

Thank you for your prompt reply. I appreciate the information about the loan process. However, before we proceed, could you please clarify what the exact interest rate is? You mentioned it in your previous email but it seems like the actual number might have been left out.

Also, could you provide more details about the loan form? What kind of information does it require? I'm just trying to understand everything clearly before moving forward.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Terry
